chapter.title: Known issues
chapter.para:
All of the known issues and road map can be found on our bug tracking system, Jira, at
http://jira.jboss.com/jira/secure/BrowseProject.jspa?id=10031 (require member plus registration, which is free). If you find more, please post them to Jira. If you have questions post them to the JBoss Remoting users forum ( http://www.jboss.com/index.html?module=bb&op=viewforum&f=222 ).
